title: thaayiDatthil
sahitya:
tAyiDattil anbillAda janmam vINE (peTra) 



caraNam 1



tAi nATTil anbillArkku dharmamEdu karmamEdu pEyAit-tiriyumavar pErEdu (paNap)



caraNam 2



mAnilattu makkaLellAm magizhndiDum narsOdararE tAnenavarindu tAyaip-pOTruvIrE (peTra)



caraNam 3



jAti matattAl shaNDai tAnEyiDum pEdayaraE jAtiyEdu matangaLEdi shATruvIrE (ungaL) tAyiDattil



caraNam 4



oTrumaiyillAda nIngaL ulagattai AluvIrO kaTrum arivillAda kashaDargaLE (kalai) tAyiDattil



caraNam 5



talaivar vacanam kETTu shAntamODavark-kuTpaTTu kalavarangaL sheivadai nIr kaiviTTu (vIN) tAyDattil



caraNam 6



shAntam ahimsai pUNDu carkAvaikkaikoNDu gAndhiyaDigaL upadEshameik-kaNDu (mahAtmA) tAyiDattil
